name: superoffer
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool betsports.
Tool description: BetSports Api
API description: Fetches the super offer data from the bet sports API.

cookie.description: Cookie string for the request header. Default is 'i18next=es;'.

host.description: Host string for the request header. Default is 'www.mozzartbet.com.co'.

referer.description: Referer string for the request header. Default is 'https://www.mozzartbet.com.co/es'.
